references.reason: This paper introduces OpenVLA, one of the two generalist robot policies used in the study to evaluate RLDG.

references.paper_title: Octo: An open-source generalist robot policy
references.reason: This paper introduces Octo, the other generalist robot policy alongside OpenVLA used to test the efficacy of RLDG.

references.paper_title: FMB: a functional manipulation benchmark for generalizable robotic learning
references.reason: This paper details the FMB benchmark used in the study, providing essential context for the evaluation tasks.

references.paper_title: SERL: A software suite for sample-efficient robotic reinforcement learning
references.reason: This work details the SERL software used to conduct the reinforcement learning experiments that are central to the RLDG method.

references.paper_title: Efficient online reinforcement learning with offline data
references.reason: This paper describes HIL-SERL, the specific reinforcement learning method employed in the RLDG study due to its sample efficiency and performance for vision-based manipulation.
